name: Witch Way (MidnightBaker, Zvr8888, DomKnob)
description:
The kingdom hadn’t seen rain for so long that all the farmers’ crops were wilting, leaving everyone outside the castle to starve.

Good-hearted, The Witch who lived in the forest just outside the kingdom could not watch the people suffer, and decided to cast a rain spell to help the crops. Unfortunately, the spellbook was old and the words unclear, so a grave mistake was made…

A poisonous cloud erupted from the cauldron. The Witch couldn’t stop its furious rampage, and was forced to run away.

***

HELP THE WITCH ESCAPE THE POISON CLOUD AND GET TO THE BROOMSTICK

BE WARY OF POTIONS FOUND ALONG THE WAY: BLUE POTIONS WILL CALM THE CLOUD, BUT A RED ONE WILL MAKE IT MORE ANGRY…

SAVE THE KINGDOM WITH THE HIGHEST LEADERBOARD SCORE

Created by:

Simon Massad- Programming, level design

Leaderboard implemented with LootLocker
